title: Why are humans way better than robots? - Quora

response.answer_text: Robots of various kinds are artifacts of human beings. That being said, industrial robots excel at repetitive tasks that require great precision. Without them numbers of modern technological products would be difficult or impossible to produce in quantity. But robots are not intelligent, creative, or any other such thing. They are the creations of human beings and despite a lot of talk about “AI” these days, no one has even come close to producing real, human-like artificial intelligence.
